summary: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armored car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.
cast: Mickey Rourke|Don Johnson|Chelsea Field|Daniel Baldwin|Giancarlo Esposito|Vanessa Williams|Robert Ginty|Tia Carrere|Julius Harris|Eloy Casados|Big John Studd|Tom Sizemore|Mitzi Martin|Kelly Hu|James Nardini|Brenan T. Baird|Branscombe Richmond|Stacey Elliott|Hans Howes|Bobbie Tyler|Marlon Darton|Jordan Lund|Steve Tannen|Billy D. Lucas|Sven-Ole Thorsen|Dennis Scott|Cody Glenn|Michele Laybourn|Debby Lynn Ross|Michael Valverde|Stan Ivar|Stan Chambers|R.J. Chambers|Theresa San-Nicholas|Sean 'Hollywood' Hamilton|Jon Luvelli|Nadine Miller
title: Dos duros sobre ruedas
